text.section: Any person who violates any of the provisions of KRS 249.020 to 249.100 or hinders the carrying out of any of the provisions of those sections shall be fined not less than twenty-five dollars ($25) nor more than five hundred dollars ($500).
Any fine imposed for a violation of subsection (4) of KRS 249.070 may be recovered in the county in which the nursery is situated or the county to which the nursery stock is shipped.

Any person who knowingly neglects or refuses to comply with the provisions of KRS 249.180 or 249.190 shall be fined not less than fifty dollars ($50) nor more than two hundred dollars ($200). Each day of violation after the notice provided in KRS 249.190 shall be a separate offense.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 142, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 433, sec. 4, effective April 10, 1990. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 231, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 14, effective June 16, 1960. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 180, sec. 11. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 42f-4, 200, 1923, 1925a-4, 1925a-9.
